snippet.title: Noblemen: 1896
snippet.description:
***Now available on the App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/noblemen-1896/id1178777377?mt=8!***

***Coming later today on Google Play!*** 

The year is 1896 and war has begun... To your right, your Militia are cut down by saber wielding cavalry. In the distance, cannon fire echoes as a lumbering Steam Tank fires its auto cannons. Your Gatling Gun Team unleashes a salvo of fire that shreds an enemy Infantry Squad to bits. Behind you, the drone of your Frigate Class Airship reassures you before unleashing its own salvo of cannon fire. 

You are a Noblemen, and its up to you to lead your army to victory!

FEATURES
- Plan your moves on the strategic map, and fight in the battles directly on the field!
- Unique alternate reality timeline!
- Complete a huge campaign!
- Dozens of units - from Infantry, to Cavalry, to Tanks, Gun Teams, Artillery, Airships, Boats, and more!
- Incredible scale - watch as giant Forts blast the battlefield from a distance, large airships loom overhead, and giant iron clad warships support your army from the beach!
- Collect and employ powerful Battle Cards to change the tide of the battle!
- Realistic shooting mechanics - from bullet drop to locational damage and realistic armor!
- Auto battle mode as an easy play option!
- Tactical Map mode - control your units on the field with advanced commands!
- Grow your army to unstoppable strength!
